Class UserRepository

java.lang.Object
br.ufal.ic.p2.jackut.repositories.UserRepository
public class UserRepository extends Object
Repositório em memória + persistência via serialização de usuários e sessões.

    • removeUserCompletely

      public boolean removeUserCompletely(String login)
      Removes a user completely from the system, including all references.
      Parameters:
      login - The login of the user to be removed
      Returns:
      true if the user was successfully removed, false otherwise
